sentences.en: After a year we will sympathetically consider an application for reinstatement.
sentences.cn: 一年后我们会对复职申请予以考虑和批准。

sentences.en: Ben considered the statue with an expert eye.
sentences.cn: 例句：本以专家的眼光审视着这座雕塑。

sentences.en: Consider what your likes and dislikes are about your job.
sentences.cn: 想想工作中哪些部分是自己喜欢的，哪些是不喜欢的。

sentences.en: Have you considered my feelings?
sentences.cn: 你考虑过我的感受吗？

sentences.en: I consider activities such as jogging and weightlifting as unnatural.
sentences.cn: 我认为像慢跑、举重这样的运动不符合自然规律。

sentences.en: I consider it my duty to write to you and thank you.
sentences.cn: 我认为写信向你表达谢意是我的责任。

sentences.en: I think one's got to consider all the possibilities.
sentences.cn: 我认为有必要考虑到各种可能性。

sentences.en: If you consider him a miracle man, you're overrating him.
sentences.cn: 如果你认为他能创造奇迹，那你是高估他了。

sentences.en: It is worth pausing to consider these statements from Mr Davies.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯先生的这番话值得大家停下来思考一下。

sentences.en: It might be worthwhile to consider your attitude to an insurance policy.
sentences.cn: 考虑一下你对投保的看法也许有所助益。

sentences.en: Only after countless rewrites did John consider the script ready.
sentences.cn: 只有经过了无数次修改后，约翰才认为剧本写好了。

sentences.en: The jury will retire to consider its verdict today.
sentences.cn: 陪审团今天将退庭商议裁决结果。

sentences.en: The local authority considered that the school did not meet requirements.
sentences.cn: 当地政府认为这所学校达不到要求。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister is said to now consider the matter closed.
sentences.cn: 据说首相现在认为此事已了结。

sentences.en: The young man is dead. We have only to consider the living.
sentences.cn: 这位年轻人已经死了。我们只能考虑在生之人。

sentences.en: This has given him a disposition to consider our traditions critically.
sentences.cn: 这使他倾向以批判眼光看待我们的传统。

sentences.en: Watersports enthusiasts should consider hiring a wetsuit as well as a lifejacket.
sentences.cn: 除了租救生衣，水上运动爱好者还应该考虑租一套潜水服。

sentences.en: We consider it a compliment to be called "conservative"
sentences.cn: 我们认为被称作“保守分子”是对我们的一种赞赏。

sentences.en: We will have to consider your offer carefully .
sentences.cn: 我们得仔细考虑你的提议。

sentences.en: We will have to consider your offer carefully.
sentences.cn: 我们得仔细考虑你的提议。

sentences.en: You’ve got to learn to consider other people!
sentences.cn: 你得学会为别人着想！

words.tran_cn: 相当大的；重要的，值得考虑的
经过深思熟虑的；被尊重的

phrases.tran_cn: 综合各方面来看；通盘考虑起来

trans.tran_cn: 认为，考虑，体谅，顾及，端详
trans.tran_en: to think about something carefully, especially before making a choice or decision
to think about something carefully, especially before making a choice or decision
